job_desc: Cyber Security is an integral part of Visa’s corporate culture. It is important to maintaining our position as an industry leader in electronic payments. At Visa, we believe that it is the responsibility of each and every employee to safeguard information, protect it from unauthorized access, and ensure regulatory compliance. Cyber Security has a significant effect on privacy, consumer confidence, external reputation, and it is a priority on everyone’s agenda. Visa's Cyber Engineering team is looking for an Opensource & Automation Engineer who will be responsible for design, development, and execution of large-scale Cyber Security initiatives. Extensive Python and web service development experience and team leadership skills are a must. In this position, you are a passionate and talented engineer/developer with problem-solving abilities and coding/testing/debugging skills who can work in a dynamic environment. You must be dedicated to delivering production-ready code in short time frames and willing to go beyond the routine.   Job Scope  Solid proficiency with Linux (or similar) operating systems Solid proficiency with Opensource security solutions    Expert knowledge of Restful web services (client – server application) Advanced Python scripting, Automation and DevOps skills etc. Software development domain and principles, including design patterns, code structure, programming languages, continuous integration (Git), continuous deployment (Travis/Jenkins), and deployment orchestration (Ansible, puppet, or equivalent) Experience with C, C++, Java, Ruby, or Python, database application (MYSql/MS SQL) Skills. Experience with Web Technologies (Apache, AJAX, HTML, JavaScript, HTTP, SOAP, XML)  Develop a framework for maintain custom signatures using YARA across all security nodes  Exposure to security management, administrative account management etc., would be a plus Understanding of: distributed systems, cloud computing, database, machine learning, data mining, statistics, data modeling      Experience with object-oriented design concepts Understanding of unit test and integration testing frameworks.  Responsibilities                                                                                                                            Develop innovative solutions to protect the Visa brand, networks, assets and products by implementing state-the-art detection, prevention, and response capabilities Engage in technical design of solutions based on use cases and business requirements Participate in proof of concepts and other technical evaluations of technologies, designs and solutions Stay abreast of emerging technologies and proactively assess and evaluate the adoption thereof into the organization Demonstrate technical mastery and be an inspirational leader and mentor who continuously develops the competencies of him/herself and others Reduce time-to-detect and time-to-remediate by driving the automation of applied threat intelligence and sensor enrichment Develop and expand API framework to interconnect Security Tools
job_req: Minimum 7 years of experience in enterprise solutions Minimum 3 years of experience in Project life cycle activities on development and maintenance projects Minimum 4 years of experience in Design and architecture review Minimum Bachelor’s degree required from an accredited institution Chinese Mandarin fluency a plus

job_desc: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM) is a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.8 trillion and operations worldwide. The firm is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers and small business, commercial banking, financial transaction processing, and asset management. A component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average, JPMorgan Chase & Co. serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the worlds most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Information about JPMorgan Chase & Co. is available at www.jpmorganchase.com.       Our group:    The Compliance Analytics Group (CA) is responsible for statistical and data analytic efforts to improve the scale and performance of JPMC’s regulatory controls relating to Anti Money Laundering (AML), Trade Surveillance, Sanctions Screening, Know Your Customer (KYC), Client Due Diligence (CDD) and other forms of financial crimes monitoring.       The Group plays a global role, engaging with major stakeholders in all of JPMC’s lines of business and countries of operation, including Business Compliance, Operations, Model Review and Technology.       Our work includes developing statistical models to identify suspicious and high risk activity across JPMC’s highly diverse customer base. This is a fast developing space and requires a combination of analytical creativity, mathematical and statistical skills, and analytical execution experience on large datasets.       Description:    We are seeking a suitable candidate with solid experience in application development, maintenance and deployment in data analytics domain to play a key role in our development of quantitative tools and analytics to guide the bank’s monitoring activities.       Major responsibilities and skills include:          Development, maintenance and deployment of quantitative tools  and delivery for projects, this requires:  Demonstrated experience in development and deployment of in-house analytics applications Ability to quickly learn and adopt to new programming languages in a fast changing environment Ability to identify and automate repetitive tasks a good understanding of machine learning & data analytical techniques Support data scientists to design, code, train, test, deploy, and iterate on machine learning systems Ability to assimilate large amounts of data from multiple sources, and create clear summaries. Documentation of all code / analysis in an organized, clear manner Willingness to contribute to colleagues’ projects that are not directly assigned to the individual          Engaging a group of senior leaders in the US to drive decisions for JPMC Corporate Compliance; critical skills are:       Good communication, both verbal and written   Summarizing technical ideas in business-friendly language         Developing subject matter expertise in JPMC products, services and clients   Understand the Compliance dimensions, and sources of relevant customer and transaction data
job_req: Key qualifications      Master / Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information science, computer information systems, data engineering or management information systems and/or equivalent work experience.    4+ years programming / software engineering experience with analytical tools and environments (Any two of SAS, Python, and R in cloud environment)   Application development experience in R Shiny a huge plus   Experience in automation   Experience with visualization tools (e.g., Spotfire, Tableau) and database language (e.g., SQL)   Experience in Machine Learning an advantage   Ability to handle multiple projects with minimal oversight, and to respond to changing business priorities        We strongly encourage all applicants to apply via our careers website where you are able join our Talent Network to receive customized vacancy notifications and ensure that your details are accessible by our global recruiting team - www.jpmorganchase.com/careers. 　 A quick link to this particular job posting can be found in this URL: http://jobs.jpmorganchase.com/ListJobs/ByKeyword/190036397/  Please note that only short-listed candidates will be notified. We thank you for your interest and wish you all the best in your career.  Yours Sincerely, Human Resources JPMorgan

job_desc: (1) Analytics      (a) Capable of designing and delivering undergraduate and master level courses in Data Analytics.            (i) For example, courses such as:                - Consumer Analytics & Applications                - Social Analytics & Applications                - Text Analytics & Applications                - Machine Learning technology & applications                - Visual Analytics & applications        (b) Deep experience in applying data analytics to real world problems in one or more industry sectors.            (i) Examples are hospitality, travel and tourism; retail, supply chain & logistics;     e-commerce; telco & Information services & health science delivery; banking & financial markets; government and public sector.         (c) Extensive hands-on experience with designing, implementing and applying data analytic solutions using leading commercial off-the-shelf enterprise software packages and/or open source software.            (i) Using commercial analytics software packages such as SAS (including Enterprise Miner), IBM Business Analytics, SPSS, Revolution R, Oracle Business Intelligence, SAP Business Intelligence.            (ii) Using open source analytics application tools            (iii) Experience with the large-scale data management tools required for analytics applications.        (d) Familiarity with state-of-the-art and emerging "next practice" trends in Data Analytics.            (i) Familiarity with the fusion of numeric and text data, or more generally, with the fusion of structured and unstructured data; increasingly real-time and on-line applications of analytics; working with continuous input streams of data; using machine learning for ongoing of assumptions, models and parameters.   (2) Information Systems and Computer Science       (a) Capable of designing and delivering undergraduate and master-level courses in Information System and/or Computer Science.             (i) Examples include:                 - Interaction Design and Prototyping                 - IT Solution Architecture                 - Enterprise Systems                 - Cloud Computing                 - Product Management                 - Software Engineering                 - Security Policy and Management          (b) Deep experience in designing, implementing and managing IT solutions in industry using custom or packaged applications.    More information on this opening can be found here: https://sis.smu.edu.sg/about/careers-opportunities/faculty-openings/education-practice systems
job_req: (1) We are continually on the lookout for outstanding faculty candidates at all levels:       - Fresh Ph.D.s       - Postdocs looking for a faculty position       - Ph.D.s who are currently in industry but want to return to faculty and research      work       - Mid-career or senior faculty   (2) Highly qualified candidates who have Master or PhD qualification can apply for a faculty position at the level of lecturer or senior lecturer. Education and Practice-Track Assistant/Associate/Full Professor appointments require a PhD degree in a closely related discipline from a well-recognised university, as well as a commensurate track record of education or practice scholarship. (Related disciplines include Computer Science, Information Technology, Information Systems, Statistics, Management Science, Marketing Analytics, Computational Physics, Computational Engineering or Science.)   (3) A passion for learning and teaching   (4) Posses outstanding communication skills.    Prior experience with consulting, training, or teaching is a strong advantage.   Interested applicants should submit a cover letter, curriculum vitae, research and teaching statements, contact details of 3 referees and 3 samples of published work. Please submit electronically to :    SIS Faculty Recruitment Email : siscv@smu.edu.sg

job_desc: TÜV SÜD is an international service corporation and a world leader in consulting, testing, certification, and training. Headquartered in Munich, Germany, TÜV SÜD, employs more than 24,000 professionals across 850 offices in more than 50 countries around the globe. In line with Singapore’s Smart Nation initiative, TÜV SÜD setup a global Center of Excellence (CoE) Digital Service in Singapore to drive the development of new services and businesses in our customers’ sectors and future markets. For our strategic development of “Continuous Certification” we are currently looking for a highly skilled senior software architect to lead implementation efforts of new tools and machine learning algorithms in the domains of ‘Smart City’, ‘Smart Equipment’, and ‘Industrie 4.0’. We offer the unique opportunity to work with world leaders at the forefront of smart digital systems, shaping the way people use rely on technology. The team of the CoE embodies the spirit of a dynamic ‘start-up’ environment, but backed with reliability and strength of an MNC.   Position Summary The Centre of Excellence Singapore is a key driver of TÜV SÜDs international digital initiative. The successful candidate will take a leading role in the development of novel tools and services under the strategic thrust of smart inspection and the domain of visual analytics. Visual inspection takes a key role in typical inspection workflows. Automation of visual inspection holds the promise to increase productivity, reduce risk, and enable novel inspection services. For example, drone-based inspection of large equipment and civil infrastructure can already automate data collection and reduce the risk for inspectors to work at height. With advanced visual analytics algorithms, defects can increasingly be identified and quantified automatically. The successful candidate will lead development projects of visual inspection technology and develop business plans to bring the technology to market.    Key Responsibilities Development of visual analytics algorithms for automatic façade inspection Toolchain integration including done base data collection, and machine learning backends Design workflow and dashboards for visual inspection services Automatically generate inspection reports Lead development teams with interdisciplinary backgrounds Liaise with TÜV SÜD domain experts and external stakeholders Project representative for TÜV SÜD for business development
job_req: §  Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or comparable with a focus on software design and implementation §  More than 5 years of relevant work experience in industry or academia developing machine learning algorithms and working with image data §  Strong project management experience §  Background in deep learning and large scale parallel processing §  Background in production ready software system development §  Team player with ability to work in international and multi-cultural teams §  Strong communications skills, fluent in English (oral and written) §  Ability to represent the company and discuss with external stakeholders §  Highly motivated to perform applied research and bring solutions to the market

job_desc: Project Name: Unattended Ground Sensors Research Fellow position available in School of EEE, NTU for industry sponsored project for developing neuromorphic embedded system for image recognition. Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects.   The position is in the BRAIN lab (http://www3.ntu.edu.sg/home/arindam.basu/ ) under the supervision of Dr. Arindam Basu. Selected candidate has to lead in system integration of custom machine learning ELM IC with neuromorphic camera and FPGA platform. He/she will get to work with cutting edge neuromorphic image sensors and develop one of the lowest power machine learning chips in the world. The candidate will get the chance to use this chip for video processing and develop new generations of this design with ample opportunity for basic research as well as commercialization through startup.  Main job is to write Verilog/VHDL codes for interfacing FPGA with custom ELM IC developed by team and neuromorphic image sensor Develop library of Verilog/VHDL codes for basic image processing blocks and neural networks Need to co-work with algorithm person to optimize the neural network for hardware friendly implementation  Application Procedure: Please email a CV and any other relevant documents to arindam.basu@ntu.edu.sg clearly mentioning the project name, job field and job position applied for. Email subject should include UGS_2_RF and all attachments to email be named as UGS_2_RF_*.  Also mention in email earliest date when you can join and intended period of stay. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified for interview.
job_req: Education: PhD in EE/ECE/CSE   Must have:  Experience in HDL coding, using FPGA kits and interfacing FPGA with computer and other components Knowledge of Neural Networks and mapping neural networks to digital systems    Good to have:  Knowledge of debugging using logic analyser    We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: The research fellow is going to work on the exciting areas of edge computing, including but not limited to the following topics:  Machine learning at the edge Applications of edge computing Chip design and architecture exploration for edge computing Algorithm design and optimization for edge computing
job_req: PhD degree in computer science/engineering or electronic engineering at a top-tier university. Experience and publications in any of these areas: Internet-of-Things, edge computing, machine learning, design automation, embedded systems, computer architecture, silicon nanophotonics, computer-aided design, etc. Self-motivated with good communication and teamworking skills. Good spoken and written English. Fresh PhD graduates are welcome to apply. Experienced applicants are preferred.    We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: The HP-NTU Digital Manufacturing Corporate Lab is a corporate research laboratory set up in partnership between NTU and tech giant HP. A series of research projects is being funded under this collaboration, mainly focusing in areas of advancing digital manufacturing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, new materials and applications, cyber security and customization. Our project currently seeks suitable team members to lead the research into various topics relating to Digital Manufacturing and subsequently develop a series of instructional programs, materials and resources focusing on Industry 4.0 revolution.
job_req: Master’s degree in Mechanical Engineering / Electrical & Computer Engineering / Computer Science Engineering or its equivalent Keen interest in the research on Artificial Intelligence Knowledge in sensory-interactive control systems and digital signal processing methods Experience working with Multi-loop Closed-loop control systems, especially in multi-input, multi-output controls Familiar with the applications of intelligent robotic technologies in advanced manufacturing will be advantageous Some experience working with sensors, actuators, controls, mechanisms, mobility and programming Self-motivated and able to work independently or as a team player with strong interpersonal and collaborative skills Effective communication skills and a good command in English (verbal and written) is essential    We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: The Offer  Join a market leader within Media & Entertainment Strong opportunities to progress your career  The Employer Our client is Asia’s leading media organisation, engaging minds and enriching lives across multiple languages and platforms. Their core business is publishing of newspapers, magazines and books in both print and digital editions. They also own other digital products, online classifieds, radio stations and outdoor media. Sitting within the Media Strategy & Analytics department, the Company's Analytics team serves as the data analytics centre of excellence for the whole company. They integrate and gatekeep all major data sources across the Company's media divisions, on top of which they create visualisations and perform analytics functions to drive business decisions. They also formulate and execute advanced analytics and machine learning projects to help business units achieve their objectives.   The Job Our client is are looking for two articulate and cross-functional audience insights specialists to join the team and help provide their media divisions with a composite view of the Company's product users, as well as identify any audience gaps in the company's product portfolio. This role will report to the Analytics Lead and work closely with the media divisions including editorial, product, ad sales and circulation sales teams. In this role you will:  Work with the data analytics and research teams to generate audience insights across disparate data sets Identify data gaps and create strategies for data collection Help to develop and track audience growth and loyalty against industry-standard targets and metrics, including benchmarking against competitors Help newsrooms create content insights to fine tune their editorial strategy and monitor the performance of the resulting content strategy Use audience insights to help product development and sales teams refine and craft new products and marketing campaigns Create dashboards and regular reports to share audience metrics and actionable insights Conduct market scanning to identify audience gaps in the product portfolio
job_req: The Profile  You have at least 2 years of experience in data, business intelligence or audience development, preferably in a media-related industry Experience with content analysis preferred You have hands-on experience with analytics tools such as Google Analytics, FB Insights and Chartbeat preferable You are familiar with interpreting and analysing survey results and large datasets You possess excellent communication skills You are comfortable multi-tasking and work well under pressure You are excellent with collaborating across departments/teams You are skilled in MS Powerpoint  Please apply for this role using the following link: https://snaphunt.com/jobs/04643002

Experience in test automation, test-driven development and cloud-based implementation will be added advantage. Experience with front end frameworks such as Angular highly regarded. Strong communication skills and an early adopter mindset highly regarded.

job_desc: Primary Responsibilities:  • Understand large data sets, build data models to address business problems • Undertake data collection, pre-processing and analysis • Build predictive models and machine learning algorithms
job_req: The role will involve analysis and extensive data crunching with good amount of hands on programming skills. This role requires following skills and experience:   • Proven experience (2-5 Years) as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst • Good knowledge on cloud technologies especially Microsoft Azure. • Experience in data mining • Understanding of machine-learning and operations research • Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++ is an asset • Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop) • Analytical mind and business acumen • Strong math skills (e.g. statistics, algebra) • Problem-solving aptitude • Excellent communication and presentation skills     Candidate should possess good soft skills as mentioned below:  • Should possess excellent problem solving and is able to work effectively in a less structured environment and manage time. • Excellent verbal and written communication skills • Work closely with onsite and offshore team members • Willing to travel to the customers locations on need basis outside of Singapore    Interested applicants, please send CVs in WORD format directly to roopinder@u3infotech.com. *Please note only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

job_desc: A research assistant position on security, formal verification and program analysis is available in the Cyber Security Lab, School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University. The research assistant will work with the cyber-security lab group using technologies in security, formal methods, machine learning and software engineering. The position involves conducting basic research, developing tools, writing report, and working as part of a research team. The position requires software analysis, machine learning and programming skills for the development of automated techniques to carry out the verification process and program analysis.
job_req: Bachelor Degree or higher in Computer Science or related fields is required. Strong background in software engineering and security. Strong programming skills.

job_desc: Be a key member of a high growth startup Lead teams to develop a range of innovative solutions that are disrupting the recruitment industry Opportunity to grow into a CTO role  The Employer Snaphunt is an AI enabled hiring platform that leverages technology to source, screen, and shortlist talent with a skills and culture fit for our clients open roles. We are fundamentally changing the way middle- senior level white collar professionals find jobs and companies hire their specialist talent and are making hiring more convenient, transparent, accurate and affordable. We have recently gone live in Singapore and are backed by top notch venture capitalists.   The Job This is a key role that will work closely with the Founder to build out a tech team in Singapore to transition certain activities from the Company's offshore development centre in India. You will also work closely with the Chief Product & Design Officer to lead and guide the tech team to meet deliver the product objectives. You will be responsible for :   Leading a team of engineers to deliver winning products. The overall planning, organising, leading, and executing of all tech initiatives with the team Ensuring the development of well-designed and testable code. Gathering and evaluating user feedback. Supporting continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and new technologies  Troubleshooting and debugging to optimise performance. Developing high-quality code to build and deploy machine learning models. Working on all parts of the code-base and contributing to every stage of the product development cycle. Driving release and sprint planning sessions.
job_req: The Profile  You possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or related field. You have at least 5 years experience in Full stack product development. Experience leading teams in a startup would be a strong plus. You possess strong knowledge of Javascript and React. You have good expertise in architecting solutions and have solid experience MongoDB and MySQL database. Expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and/or Computer vision would be highly valuable. You have strong communication and interpersonal skills and a solid track record in IT business partnering roles and driving technology initiatives and programs. You possess strong analytical skills and love solving problems. You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments. You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders.

job_desc: MRC (www.mrc-asia.com) is an independent consulting firm offering Compensation & Predictive Analytics, leveraging on the power of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. This is a unique entry-level role to consulting. You will work in a very entrepreneurial and fast-paced environment. Work is interesting and cutting-edge. Colleagues are smart, hardworking, creative and fast. You will be involved in:-  Front-end prospecting and selling Delivery of data services, involving research, production and servicing Supporting consultants in projects  We offer:  Intellectually stimulating work and overseas travel on projects Starting salary commensurate with academic achievement and potential Intensive in-house training, rapid career development and increment for outstanding performers  Interested applicants to send CV to apply@mrc-asia.com, indicating your qualification, skills set, experience, current and expected remuneration.
job_req: Minimum Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative discipline (such as Engineering, Actuarial Science, Accountancy, Statistics or Mathematics) Fresh grad or up to one year of working experience preferred Fluent in English and Chinese (Mandarin), as work involves China clients Advanced Excel skill and use of Power BI Sharp, numerate, careful and detail-minded but also keen to interact with people.

job_desc: INPUT: Key projects and initiatives aligned to the EM Business Intelligence roadmap for 2018-2023 (such as Compass Phases 2 and 3, Territory 360, Customer 360, Attrition Analysis); project proposals containing business rationale, impact, and resource requirements; other business requirements from region/area/LOC senior stakeholders PROCESS: Work closely with EM Business Intelligence Director in managing the delivery of key pilot projects and initiatives within the function for the whole Emerging Markets; provide regular updates on progress vs plan, highlight risks and opportunities, communicate support needed, manage project dashboard; utilize project management and facilitation  OUTPUT: Management and communication of project status and delivery, execution plans, milestones, metrics and progress. Mitigation/Risk management support as required. ACCOUNTABLE for  Leading the BI innovation team (i.e. MCM Analytics Lead, other resources) and prepare roll-out to other LOCs, and liaising with Global Tech and Global DDA (digital, data, analytics) teams to pursue best-in-class project deployment across Emerging Markets Engaging GMs and SVPs in obtaining support and buy-in for innovation projects that will benefit LOCs in driving business performance Leading key BI projects from end-to-end and ensuring on-track execution against timeline and other agreed expectations Developing new techniques using artificial intelligence, machine learning, and other predictive analytics models to innovate and explore bold moves that will give the competitive advantage to Emerging Markets to win against competition using advanced analytics Serving as catalyst in pursuing new ideas from senior leaders that will deliver best-in-class solution to key business issues and take advantage of opportunities Effectively communicating project objectives and progress to ensure engagement and alignment across EM BI team and within EM ComEx LT Collaborating and forging value-adding partnerships within EM BI team and other ComEx stakeholders through project management and facilitation Promoting a culture of relentless continuous improvement with clear objectives and plans, lead & lag indicators and measures of success. Effectively managing project budget and engaging with external vendors in exploring suitable solutions for the projects at-hand Promoting rapid sharing of best practices and ensuring fast, clear and consistent implementation of EM BI initiatives
job_req: At least 5 years of relevant experience Min Degree in Technology or related Strong communciation skills  Ability to engage with senior stakeholders

job_desc: Design image processing and machine learning algorithms for the development of optical and opto-mechanical systems. Develop software and control algorithms for new systems. Responsibilities:  Work together with world-class researchers to develop and expand image processing capabilities for detection of ultra-fine defects in optical products Research and implement innovative ideas/algorithms to improve measurement quality in systems development Assist team members in various stages of systems development, including testing, verification and reliability checks
job_req: Bachelors/Masters in Computer Engineering with at least 3 years of working experience Experience with development, implementation and deployment of image processing algorithm Experience in C/C++ and C# programming Knowledge in machine vision is preferred Knowledge in PLC programming is desired

job_desc: ABOUT TAIGER Headquartered in Singapore, TAIGER is a fast-growing Artificial Intelligence (AI) company with a global footprint. Our mission is to help organizations optimize operational efficiencies by automating complex cognitive tasks. We are a market leader and the pioneer of Knowledge Work AutomationTM. The solutions we provide use natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision techniques (e.g. semantic analysis, concept-extraction, multi-language knowledge graphs, and object detection) to provide unparalleled accuracy in information extraction for industry leaders across the financial services, government sectors and more. TAIGER is recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor. Find out more about us at www.taiger.com and www.linkedin.com/company/taiger   SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER We are looking for an experienced leader that is passionate about the potential of TAIGER. You should be genuinely excited by the prospect of building new functions and leading a passionate team of high performers as TAIGER expands in scale; and be motivated by the proposition of your contributions having a real impact on TAIGER’s growth.   RESPONSIBILITIES  Develop algorithms, data models and build products and solutions based on state-of-the-art AI technology. Create innovative, marketable products using research in fields of NLP, Semantics and Machine Learning. Design architecture and behaviour of software modules and use industry Agile standards to perform analysis, estimation, implementation, testing and deployment of applications. Ensure technical quality through best practices like TDD, Code Review, CI. Bring ideas to the table to improve TAIGER’s technology and product. Work and be involved in key decisions in Engineering, Product and Delivery teams. Take leadership in driving projects or product features while working in autonomous, cross-functional squads, taking ownership of development activities and knowledge sharing. Mentor and guide junior developers and provide technical expertise.
job_req: REQUIREMENTS  MSc/BSc in computer science, engineering or related technical discipline, or equivalent. 5+ years of experience in software development with team management experience. Strong experience in Java EE, Spring, Object Orientation and Design Patterns. Solid knowledge in databases, like MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, architecture patterns, like MVC, ETL, SOA, Microservices, and software best practices, like TDD, CI. Familiarity with Agile or XP methodologies. Excellent written and oral communication skills in English with ability to effectively communicate with teams and clients.    YOU WILL BE AT AN ADVANTAGE WITH THESE SKILLS  Understanding in front-end development like JavaScript, HTML, CSS. Good understanding of security, performance, scalability aspects Working knowledge on software lifecycle management, code organization and experience as a tech lead or project manager. Proactivity in suggesting solutions and improvements. Familiarity or interest in AI, Semantic Technologies, NLP and Search Engines.    In TAIGER we believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will result in a better workplace for our team and a better product for our clients. Join the growing team at TAIGER today!

job_desc: Taiger  seeks Software Engineers to join our engineering team and help us design and implement highly performing software. Successful candidates have a proven track record developing software for the Web and hold a BsC, MsC or PhD in computer science, engineering or related field. As a Software Engineer in Taiger you will contribute to the development of innovative products, based on state-of-the-art technologies, and able to make a significant impact in the industry. You should genuinely be excited by an unstructured, fast moving startup environment where your contribution matters. We are building a culture and team with those that are generally excited about the technology we are building and the problems we're solving. Joining a growing team where your responsibilities have a real potential to expand in scale and scope should be a compelling proposition to you. RESPONSIBILITIES   Build products and solutions based on state-of-the-art AI technology.   Apply research on the fields of NLP, Semantics and Machine Learning to create innovative, marketable products.   Develop algorithms and data models to implement new functionalities.   Design the architecture and behaviour of software modules.   Follow Agile practices to perform analysis, estimation, implementation, testing and deployment of applications.   Work in in autonomous, cross-functional Squads, taking ownership of development activities and sharing knowledge across peers.   Ensure technical quality through best practices such as TDD, Code Review, CI.   Bring ideas to the table to improve the technology and product.   Work with Engineering, Product and Delivery teams and be involved in key decisions.   Take leadership in driving projects or product features.   Mentor and guide junior developers and provide technical expertise where required
job_req: REQUIREMENTS  Team management experience 5+ years of experience in software development. BSc or MSc in computer science, engineering or a related technical discipline (or equivalent), preferred. Strong experience in Java EE, Spring. Solid knowledge of Object Orientation and Design Patterns. Knowledge on databases, e.g. MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server. Knowledge about architecture patterns, e.g. MVC, ETL, SOA, Microservices. Familiarity with Agile or XP methodologies. Knowledge of software best practices, like TDD, CI. Excellent written and oral communication skills in English. Ability to effectively communicate within the team, as well as with clients.  PREFERRED  Knowledge of frontend development - Javascript, HTML, CSS. Good understanding of security, performance, scalability aspects. Working knowledge on software lifecycle management and code organization. Experience as a tech lead or project manager. Proactivity in suggesting solutions and improvements. Familiarity or interest in AI, Semantic Technologies, NLP and Search Engines.

job_desc: Artificial Intelligence Research in Civil Engineering Investigate advance artificial intelligence methods (e.g., machine learning, data-driven simulation, computer vision) to develop and implement methods that are capable of successfully integrating the uncertainties, dynamics, interdependencies, and other complexities into project management approaches and systems (e.g., BIM, safety, productivity). Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
job_req: A Ph.D. degree in Civil Engineering or a related field.

job_desc: We are looking for an expert in machine learning to help us extract value from our data. You will lead all the processes from data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, to training models and deploying them to production. The ideal candidate will be passionate about artificial intelligence and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the field. Responsibilities - Understanding business objectives and developing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress - Managing available resources such as hardware, data, and personnel so that deadlines are met - Analyzing the ML algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and ranking them by their success probability - Exploring and visualizing data to gain an understanding of it, then identifying differences in data distribution that could affect performance when deploying the model in the real world - Verifying data quality, and/or ensuring it via data cleaning - Supervising the data acquisition process if more data is needed - Finding available datasets online that could be used for training - Defining validation strategies - Defining the preprocessing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset - Defining data augmentation pipelines - Training models and tuning their hyperparameters - Analyzing the errors of the model and designing strategies to overcome them - Deploying models to production
job_req: - Proficiency with a deep learning framework such as TensorFlow or Keras - Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and pandas - Expertise in visualizing and manipulating big datasets - Proficiency with OpenCV - Familiarity with Linux - Ability to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency

job_desc: Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects. Job Description: A Research Associate position is available in the School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering at Nanyang Technological University. This position is for detecting high frequency signals of unknown bandwidths received from a wideband antenna array. Modulation types of the received signals have to be identified. Multiple signals with diverse modulation and bandwidth characteristics can be present in the detected signals. Machine learning algorithms have to be developed to solve the above listed tasks. Training data is expected to have known as well as unknown signals too.
job_req: Master's Degree in a relevant field. Research experiences in machine learning algorithm development is essential. Deep learning, randomization-based fast learning neural networks and random forest based algorithms in the context of classification and time series analysis are extremely valuable. Exposure to signal processing will be an advantage. Excellent programming skills are needed.   We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: A research fellow position is available in the areas of cyber security, machine learning, and software engineering. The position involves conduct research and experiments on the topics of cyber security and machine learning, including detection of cyberattacks, malware and software vulnerability in machine learning systems, tool implementation to detection algorithms, and writing research reports and documents. Applicants should have relevant background in security, machine learning, software development, testing, and program analysis. Applicants should be proficient in Python, C++, Java, JavaScript.
job_req: PhD degree on software engineering, computer science, engineering, or other related disciplines.  Knowledge in security, machine learning, software engineering, and related areas. Be able to conduct research individually and collaboratively. Fluency in Python, C++, Java, JavaScript. Excellent communication and writing skills, ability to take initiatives, and hard-working.

job_desc: We are looking for researches who pursue innovative ways to resolve difficult challenges and who have strong publications in machine learning/deep learning/computer vision to support their passionate advocates.  Work on growing company's A.I offerings through innovative machine learning algorithms Work across teams to define product development technical roadmap Implement deep learning / machine learning into prototypes / products
job_req: Master Degree in Computer Science or IT Engineering related, or equivalent practical experience Good knowledge and experience in Java or C++ or Python Teamwork skills, exeptional analytical skills

job_desc: Job description:  You will be working on the development of front-end audio processing for tele-conferencing system. With the guidance of a research team, you will be implementing a fusion centre that performs speech diarization. You are expected to have keen interests in data synchronisation, acoustic signal processing and/or machine learning. You should be familiar with Python programming language. Familiarity with cloud computing and software frameworks such as Matlab, Numpy, Pytorch, Tensorflow, or Keras is an advantage (though not necessary). In terms of research exposure, you will also be given the opportunity to learn, apply, and develop algorithms to enhance, extract, and transcribe noisy speech signals using a variety of signal processing and machine learning algorithms. You will therefore be exposed to theories and practices of signal processing and machine learning. You will have the opportunity to work closely with other research staff to implement these algorithms in Python programming language.
job_req: Job Requirements:  Good Honors degree in Electrical/Electronics/Computer Engineering; Meticulous and keen to learn;  Good background in linear algebra and signal processing; Experience/keen interest in acoustic signal processing and machine learning; Experience with Python programming language; Able to work independently and willing to co-operate with existing team members; Fluent in both verbal and written English; Highly motivated and able to commit the whole period of the project 	 	* Interested candidates please send your CV/Resume to:    Assoc. Prof. Andy Khong 	E-mail Address:andykhong@ntu.edu.sg

job_desc: Job description: You will be responsible for developing natural language processing (NLP)/natural language understanding (NLU) technologies to support key application areas in the context of learning analytics. The overall scope of the project involves development of novel deep learning architectures for textual analysis obtained from in-house developed microphone system. As a research fellow, you will be responsible for the analysis of speech-to-text signals and text summarization.  Job Role:  Design and development of robust algorithms and techniques using text analytics, image analytics and machine learning  Integrate, simulate and test impact of algorithms and features on the overall system Design and build machine learning and optimisation algorithms efficiently Develop and execute necessary analyses, simulations or A/B tests to validate models and identify improvement opportunities Results-oriented – ability to handle multiple, time-sensitive projects while focusing on the quality Store, retrieve and visualise results in a manner that facilitates required analyses
job_req: Job Requirements:  PhD degree in Electrical/Electronics/Computer Engineering/Computer Science or relevant fields.  Knowledge of Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing theory and applications Familiar with problems related to natural language understanding and machine translation and available Machine Learning/Deep Learning tools commonly used for implementation purposes Comprehensive coding experience in at least one object oriented programming language (Java, C++, Python) Strong development and engineering skills and experience with Deep Learning platforms (Tensorflow / Pytorch) Excellent publication records in top-tier journals  Able to work independently and willing to co-operate with existing team members Fluent in both verbal and written English;  Highly motivated and able to commit the whole period of the project  	* Interested candidates please send your CV/resume to: Assoc. Prof. Andy Khong 	E-mail Address for E-mailed Applications: andykhong@ntu.edu.sg

job_desc: HIGHLIGHTS:  Join our team early on and craft the tech stack that will power future factories. You will have the opportunity to wear many hats and gain hands-on experience in many functions of the business. Become proficient in a relatively new software engineering field of machine learning focused infrastructure. Have flexible work arrangements such as flexible working hours and work from home.   YOUR MISSION: We are looking for dedicated Software Engineer to turn the dream of a self-aware factory into reality. You will be working hand-in-hand with our CTO (http://github.com/mindworker) and your mission is to build and grow the data platform that manufacturers of the future are going to use. This is the Wild West, so be comfortable to adapt to changing responsibilities. We do not require you to know everything but you have to be willing to constantly learn new things and explore the unknown. Your responsibilities can range from:   Build ML development flows through automation (CI/CD for Machine Learning)   Implement flexible data pipelines that can handle hundreds of million parts per year   Get involved in product development and architect greenfield software   Lead our developer team in implementation, setting coding standards for the company     YOUR VALUES:   Do you prefer autonomous work over a rigid task list?   Do you see the great impact of manufacturing on our society?   Are you a no-bullshit person?   If you answer all with 'yes', we encourage you to apply.   EQUAL OPPORTUNITY: We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
job_req: ABOUT YOU:   You have 2+ years of experience in software development   You are familiar with Python, Typescript (Microservices, RabbitMQ, TensorFlow is a big plus)   You take ownership of projects   You communicate well in English

job_desc: The Delta-NTU Corporate Laboratory for Cyber-Physical Systems was jointly established by the School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE) at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) and Delta Electronics The Corp Lab aims to create business value through collaborative commercialization of translational research and industrial development.  The successful candidates will conduct research and development work related to Smart Manufacturing. The candidates are expected to contribute in effort targets pave new solution business in Smart Manufacturing in the Asia Pacific Region. Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 12th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2018 QS World University Rankings by Subjects. Delta Electronics was founded in 1971 and is a global leader in Power Electronics, Energy Management and Smart Green Life, with over 50 R&D sites globally and more than 5,000 R&D engineers. Job Responsibilities:    You will be conducting research and development in the area of user modelling and recommender systems. Specifically, it is an industry funded project and you will be working closely together with the team in NTU and a world-wide reputable company.  You will be researching, designing and developing recommender systems with the advanced Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning techniques like deep learning, in the application domain of learning and education.
job_req: PhD degree in CS or a related discipline; Sufficient research and development experience in user modelling and recommender system; Excellent programming skills, and good knowledge and experience on Software Engineering are an asset; Excellent English writing and speaking skills.   Application Procedure: Interested candidates please send your CV/resume, a list of publications with relevant journal impact factors, a list of at least 2 references, and all relevant academic certificates to:   Asst Prof Zhang Jie School of Computer Science and Engineering Nanyang Technological University 50 Nanyang Avenue Block N4-02c-100 Singapore 639798   Email Address for E-mailed Applications: ZHANGJ@NTU.EDU.SG   Electronic submission of application is highly encouraged.   We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: Our team is working towards building software to support services those drive contextual content on the customer as well as partner facing website across multiple travel booking engines. Ideal candidate will work on software solutions that use cutting edge technologies such as machine learning (ML), third party data management etc. to build our client’s customer experience solutions.   Role: As a Software Development Engineer (SDE) on the team, you will work closely with engineering, product teams and UX designers to understand requirements, research/document the technological criteria necessary to meet those requirements, and ensure rollouts are delivered with the committed features.
job_req: You will design and implementation of high performance, scalable, robust and reliable sever applications that support key initiatives of our client. You will prototype creative solutions quickly by developing minimum viable products and work with others in crafting and implementing the technical vision. You will provide code reviews to assess overcall code quality and flexibility, and the application of good object oriented programming techniques. You will drive continuous improvement and continuous delivery in our software development process within an agile development team. You will write automated unit, system and acceptance tests as appropriate to support our continuous integration pipelines. You will work closely with other talented developers both local and in various other offices of our client around the world to ensure code quality, appropriate testing and design to ensure excellent product quality.    Requirements / Qualifications:  5-7 years of experience in software development with shipping large, cross-functional projects in a global internet service environment. Relevant industry experience developing in Java and its associated technology stacks such as Spring. Experience building web services in the cloud, particularly with AWS solutions. Proficient with algorithms and data structures, design patterns, SOA (service oriented architecture), domain driven design, multi-threading, concurrency, caching and distributed systems Experience in agile/scrum teams, and a track record of learning from your actions to make positive adjustments. Working knowledge of SQL databases and other NoSQL solutions. Experience with C++, Templates and Boost libraries a bonus. Verbal and written communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner. BS Degree in Computer Science or related engineering discipline. Solid understanding of the software development life cycle, architecture and design, software craftsmanship and test strategies.

job_desc: We help organizations to work smarter and grow faster. Our work is always evolving to respond to industry trends and management focus, and we combine our deep technical skills in response to our clients' changing needs. Over time, what we do remains closely linked with helping our clients improve the way they operate, innovate and grow, reduce costs, manage risks, leverage talent and change the way they do business. Our aim is to support our clients in designing, managing and executing lasting beneficial change.  We pride ourselves on our strong supportive team culture and diverse mix of backgrounds. We also strongly believe in the importance of potential and desire to learn. As such is it important to us that you fit well within our team, have a strong desire to learn and develop your own skills and also support and coach others.   If you share the same vision we want you on our team! Join us and gain exposure to a wide range of industry clients, be rewarded with a career built on a variety of experiences, and the opportunity for senior leadership development within our firm. We will also provide you the opportunity to develop a global network of contacts across PwC who will support you in your growth as a leader, consultant and process automation professional.   DESCRIPTION The role of Technology Consulting (Intelligent Automation) sits within the Digital and Emerging Technology practice of PwC Consulting. Intelligent Automation is one of our key offerings and this role is responsible for managing our client pursuits and engagements across client value delivery, people development and business operations. As the Intelligent Automation Associate, you will also continually collaborate with other Technology consulting functions (such as Data & Analytics, Cybersecurity and Digital Solutions) to foster innovation, efficiency and holistic solutions for our clients. Ideally the  associate should have the technical capability to develop and test with relevant understanding of the process automation implementation lifecycle which are essential to carry out some or all of the following responsibilities:   RESPONSIBILITIES     To work with client team and key stakeholders to execute engagement sprints with exceptional status reporting To identify risks, undertake root cause analysis, build mitigation plan around it and seek support in appropriate forums to ensure delivery and outcome parameters To work with Intelligent Automation leadership in practice development through: Development of Intelligent Automation proof of concepts (POC) in advanced stages in terms of Machine Learning, Conversational Intelligence, and Artificial Intelligence etc. Development of go-to-market strategies, white papers, etc. Assisting in managing vendor alliances, other PwC teams in Singapore/SEA and other PwC Intelligent Automation entities globally Evangelizing intelligent automation across the firm and across Southeast Asia (SEA) region To be successful in this role, you will need to demonstrate:   Consulting mindset with systematic thinking Business Analysis and understanding client needs Business Acumen across one or more industries/ functions Clear and impactful presentation skills Ability to work with unpredictability and loosely defined problems Ability to interact and collaborate effectively and professionally Self-motivated with minimal need for executive steer Passion for using intelligent automation to solve client problems in an agile manner Ability to propose solutions while collaborating with closely related spectrum of Data and Analytics, Change Management, Enterprise Solutions, Cybersecurity etc. Passion to work with, learn from and mentor teams with varying skill sets, background, and geographical locations
job_req: 3+ years of experience with a consulting or technology firm.  Possess  understanding in the areas of Technology automation / robotics tools (Automation Anywhere, Blue Prism, UiPath, Work Fusion etc.) and understanding of the technical architecture. Certification Some experience with broader business process re-engineering efforts and principles (Lean, workflow design, etc.).  Understanding of Microsoft Power point, Excel and Word skills. Self-driven, curious and a fast-learner, and able to take responsibility for personal growth and development Able to demonstrate the ability to research and analyse pertinent client, industry, and technical matters Possess strong problem-solving skills and able to prioritise and manage multiple tasks Able to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms Passionate about client service
address: MARINA ONE EAST TOWER, 7 STRAITS VIEW 018936

job_desc: Job Responsibilities:  Familiar with chatbot workflow (intent/action/entity/context design) Maintain and update the existed chatbot system for new requests. Good insight to design new scenario and self-requirement of the system. Well knowledge in data/machine learning that will assists in AI colleague to apply model and significant data to the system. Collaborate and communicate with management, internal, and external partners regarding analysis results, methodologies, project progress, and issue resolution
job_req: Job Requirements:  Bachelor in Computer Science or other related discipline is required. Advanced degree related to chatbot, Machine Learning & AI preferred Minimum 1 years of relevant industry experience Knowledge of Python, Java, PHP, Linux architecture and scripting Good learner in NLP, chatbot development in multi-language and AI. A proven team player and contributor who can multi-task and deliver against timelines Fluent in both English and Mandarin (in order to liaise with Mandarin speaking associates)

job_desc: Business Integrity's mission is to ensure safe and trusted connections between people, businesses, and Facebook. Our team works together to anticipate and predict potential threats to our platform, design and build tools to protect against these threats, and then implement and enforce these systems at scale. We leverage data analysis, machine learning and a robust infrastructure to review the quality of promoted content on our platform. We partner closely with several cross-functional teams, including product, engineering, and data science, to ensure high quality and safe experiences for both people and businesses across the Facebook family of apps.   Successful candidates for this team are adaptable, creative, have a bias toward action, aren't afraid of being wrong, and can successfully work across various teams & countries. Opportunities are available in Singapore.

job_desc: FPGA Application Developer (AI Platform) 4Paradigm Technology (Singapore) ABOUT US  4Paradigm Technology (第四范式, https://www.4paradigm.com/) is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) service and solution provider with headquarter in Beijing, China. The company has cutting-edge machine learning technologies helping enterprises improve efficiency, reduce risk, and maximize business value. The company’s clients are from banks, insurances, investments, governments, energy, hospitals, security, media, and retail. The representative clients include Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (the world’s largest bank), Ruijin Hospital (one of the most reputable hospitals in China) and so on. The company has received joint investment from Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Bank of China and China Construction Bank in 2018. This is the first time of joint investment into a technology company by state-owned banks in China. The Singapore R&D office was established in 2018, which is the first oversea branch of 4Paradigm Technology. We are looking for talents to join us to help build next generation AI platforms. WORKING LOCATION Singapore JOB DESCRIPTION The Singapore-based R&D office is looking for FPGA Application Developers to help build the next generation high performance AI platforms. •     Profiling and performance analysis for existing systems •     Performance improvement for AI applications employing FPGA acceleration

job_desc: Company overview: Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers. The area: Global Clients & Agency Solutions Our Global Clients & Agency Solutions team helps serve some of the world's largest brands. Our dedicated teams of marketing and advertising specialists use their unique skill sets to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age. We aspire to advise our clients on all aspects of their online business strategy. Using Google's broad range of products, we help our clients connect instantly and seamlessly with their audiences. The role: Unskippable Labs Experimentation Lead - Singapore Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users. Additional Role Description: Unskippable Labs' vision is to provide leading-edge guidance on vertically-driven ad campaign effectiveness through global scaled experimentation and analysis driven by machine learning and activated through flexible engagements with key Global Client and Agency Solutions (GCAS) and Large Customer Sales (LCS) clients to evolve their advertising on our platforms and beyond.  As the Unskippable Labs Experimentation Lead , you will help shape the Unskippable Lab’s Experimentation agenda for Asia-Pacific (APAC) and lead client engagements to educate them on our understanding of how ads and attention are evolving. You will apply knowledge from existing experimentation to our customers; creative assets, identify the right experiment opportunities, clearly defining the hypotheses, setting up the experiment, and distilling it down into actionable insights. You will also be responsible for managing the Unskippable team in APAC. In this role, you will work with the Advanced Brand Acceleration Ads Intelligence team to develop new templates and reporting dashboards that enable sellers to do their analyses of experiments. Responsibilities: - Consult on creative assets of opportunities with clients and their agencies. Present key creative and vertical narratives and identify experimentation opportunities against the areas outlined by the team. - Develop hypotheses for experimentation and lead the pitch with clients. Work with the creative strategist and agencies on the development of the test assets. - Lead the analysis and interpretation of results and insights across all experiments. Scale learnings internally with other APAC teams. - Lead recruitment of the Unskippable Army and manage regular trainings and connects. Work closely with the APAC Experiments team. - Connect regularly with the experimentation leads in other Unskippable Lab centres, share learnings, and share best practices for the APAC team. Liaise with the ABAT Ad Intelligence team to leverage scalable templates and tools.
job_req: Minimum qualifications: - 3 years of experience in a video specialist and/or analytical role. - Experience with Google and YouTube media and measurement solutions products. Preferred qualifications: - Experience as a video specialist, analytical lead, or Account Strategist in LCS or Global Client and Agency Solutions (GCAS). - Experience as an account manager and video technologies. - Able to make recommendations for clients about how to best use Google/YouTube media and measurement products. - Ability to craft stories from data, frame hypotheses, and mine data and insights around creative effectiveness. Ability to craft presentations for clients. - Ability to identify opportunities comfortably speaking in front of executive audiences. - Interest about how ads work. Excellent business judgment, analytical, and presentation skills.

job_desc: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that fosters world-class scientific research and talent to drive economic growth and transform Singapore into a vibrant knowledge-based and innovation driven economy.  For more information about A*STAR, please visit: www.a-star.edu.sg To drive the adoption of industry 4.0 solutions, ARTC will be setting up a FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods) full scale demonstrator. This public-private partnership programme aims to co-develop a hyper personalised line with industry players, to collaborate and develop Future or Manufacturing (FoM) technologies, based on real applications in advanced manufacturing and remanufacturing. With the demonstrating platform being developed together with end-users, technology providers and research institutes in A*STAR and institutes of higher learning (IHL) to test-bed processes, benefits to the economy and the workforce. We are looking for an enthusiastic individual who will be supporting our connectivity and machine to machine communications group which is in charge of supporting the connectivity infrastructure for our this project. The responsibilities include development and implementation of different machine to machine communication paradigms, IoT and cloud connectivity. JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: -  Be part of a taskforce to support and contribute to the Factory of the future (Industry 4.0) vision for the centre with impact to Singapore as whole. Research, investigate and execute smart manufacturing factory concepts in machine to machine communications within the context of the Factory of the Future (knowledge about the manufacturing domain will be most welcomed). To support the development of Machine to machine communications with the support of domain experts in the field. To perform research on smart manufacturing concepts applied to the FMCG domain and its related processes with the support of experts in the field who will be providing ground knowledge to interpret results from the data mining and machine learning activities. To lead the writing of technical reports and presentations of technical results.
job_req: Bachelor/Master of science in:  Telecommunications, Physics, Mechanical Engineering, Control Engineering, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics. Development skills in one or more of the following: Python, Java or C++ is desired. Knowledge about Thingsworx platform will be a plus. Excellent interpersonal and communication (verbal & written) skills in English is a must. Ability to multitask and roadmap project needs. job_desc: The Tectus Dreamlab team pioneers the development of cutting-edge cross-platform apps in the engineering and construction sector. The flagship product, “Screening Eagle” Virtual Inspection Platform, is a holistic portal for asset monitoring, maintenance and inspection. The engineers are spread across iOS, web frontend, backend, AR/VR, 3D rendering, computer vision and machine learning. You’ll be part of a small and highly talented team of people working end-to-end on the products. Our primary backend stack is Go, but it’s ok if you don’t have direct experience with it because we believe strongly that a good engineer can pick up any language in short time. We rapidly adopt emerging best-of-breed technologies, like Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform and React/Redux, to name few. Responsibilities  Take ownership of the backend tasks and work closely with the development teams; Design and implement the business logic through strategic choice of data structure and algorithms; Develop, test, document and deploy web APIs, batch jobs, webhooks, or integrations based on the business requirements; Emphasise heavily on code testing and designing for testability; Continuously document design decisions; Adopt best dev-ops/tech-ops practices and make continuous automated testing, releases and deployments; Offer mentorship to junior developers in the team.
job_req: Required Qualifications  BS in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience; Strong programming skills, solid data structure and algorithm fundamentals; At least 4 years of practical backend development for real-world products in any language/framework, preferably in Go. Experience in SQL databases, writing schemas and designing high performance queries; Experience in in-memory key-value database like Redis; Deep technical understanding of scalability, resilience, high availability and the corresponding architecture, technologies and designs; Experience with dev-ops/tech-ops, like Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, to name a few; Familiar with AWS services and related cloud technologies; Experience in Containerization and Orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes; Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills; Self-motivated and willing to learn new technologies continuously; Embrace the open source community.

job_desc: We are inviting suitable highly motivated candidates to apply for a full-time position in the Tan Chin Tuan Lab of Optical Imaging, Photodynamic and Proton Therapy Laboratory, Precision Radiation Oncology Programme. job_req: - PhD in Computational Biology or Computer Science or Mathematics or Biostatistics or Physics. - Highly motivated, organised, meticulous and committed to high quality standards. - Knowledge and experience in biostatistical analyses of clinical datasets preferred. - Knowledge and experience in genomics analyses (e.g. analyses of WES, RNASeq data) preferred. - Able to work independently under pressure as well as in a team.

job_desc: Company overview: Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers. The area: Global Clients & Agency Solutions Our Global Clients & Agency Solutions team helps serve some of the world's largest brands. Our dedicated teams of marketing and advertising specialists use their unique skill sets to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age. We aspire to advise our clients on all aspects of their online business strategy. Using Google's broad range of products, we help our clients connect instantly and seamlessly with their audiences. The role: Creative Strategist, Unskippable Labs - Singapore Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users. Additional Role Description: Unskippable Labs vision: to provide leading-edge guidance on vertically-driven ad campaign effectiveness through global scaled experimentation and analysis driven by machine learning and activated through flexible engagements with key GCAS and LCS clients to evolve their advertising on our platforms and beyond.  This role will lead creative guidance as a part of the Unskippable Labs center team in partnership with insights and product/brand specialists. You will be the creative thought leader within your region, team and vertical. You will also diagnose opportunities for improving creative effectiveness in video and implement them in partnership with clients and agencies. Responsibilities: - Develop the core creative guidance for ad effectiveness across formats in partnership with media and product specialists. - Deliver that guidance in compelling and actionable ways to executive creative and brand clients. - Provide effective feedback on creative during development from idea to storyboard to edited assets. - Develop new hypotheses for creative experimentation and explore them via both client and unbranded experimentation. - Partner with regional service teams to ensure cohesive guidance on ad effectiveness recommendations.
job_req: Minimum qualifications: - BA/BS degree in a related field, or equivalent practical experience. - 7 years of experience in creative strategy with demonstrated expertise in digital video. Preferred qualifications: - Experience working across brand verticals and geographies. - Ability to create effective ads, from initial idea through final edit. - Developed writing, pitch-crafting and presenting skills.
