job_desc: Company overview: Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers. The area: Trust & Safety At Google we work hard to earn our users’ trust every day. Trust & Safety is Google’s team of abuse fighting and user trust experts working daily to make the internet a safer place. We partner with teams across Google to deliver bold solutions in abuse areas such as malware, spam and account hijacking. A diverse team of Analysts, Policy Specialists, Engineers, and Program Managers, we work to reduce risk and fight abuse across all of Google’s products, protecting our users, advertisers, and publishers across the globe in over 40 languages. The role: Abuse Analyst, Real Time Communications - Singapore Trust & Safety team members are tasked with identifying and taking on the biggest problems that challenge the safety and integrity of our products. They use technical know-how, excellent problem-solving skills, user insights, and proactive communication to protect users and our partners from abuse across Google products like Search, Maps, Gmail, and Google Ads. On this team, you're a big-picture thinker and strategic team-player with a passion for doing what’s right. You work globally and cross-functionally with Google engineers and product managers to identify and fight abuse and fraud cases at Google speed - with urgency. And you take pride in knowing that every day you are working hard to promote trust in Google and ensuring the highest levels of user safety. Additional Role Description: Our Trust & Safety team has the critical responsibility of protecting Google's users and ensuring online safety by fighting web abuse and fraud across Google products. The Trust and Safety Real Time Communications (RTC) team’s mission is to stop abusers from exploiting the gaps on our RTC products.   As an Abuse Analyst you will help us uncovering complex abuse issues, using machine learning and analytics and working closely with our engineering partners. You will understand the user's point of view and leverage big-picture thinking, strategic leadership, and technical skills to ensure their safety and meet their needs. In this role, you will work globally and cross-functionally with Product Managers and engineering partners to navigate challenging online safety situations and quickly handle abuse and fraud cases. Responsibilities: - Develop anti-abuse programs to solve for cross-product vulnerabilities and ensure successful global roll-outs. Design countermeasures for attacks across various client properties. - Analyze metrics, dig into underlying vulnerabilities, and design solutions. Represent the abuse team in cross-functional, cross-product area conversations with teams around the company, advising on counter-abuse strategies and coordinating integration efforts. - Develop and deploy machine learning models collaborating with Engineering partners to solve fraud/abuse problems at scale. - Define workflow processes for manual reviews and machine learning labels. Collaborate with Product, Design, Legal, Policy, and Industry partners to advance the state-of-the-art across the Internet as a whole. - Align cross-functional teams toward a common, measurable goal.
job_req: Minimum qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related technical field. - Experience deriving abuse signals and conclusions from data. - Experience summarizing data. - Experience facilitating automation and prevention processes. Preferred qualifications: - Experience in a technical role (e.g., Data Scientist, Quantitative Analyst, Technical Program Manager, Engineer). - Experience developing machine learning models. Experience in one or more programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++). - Experience in statistics, working with statistical packages (e.g., R, SAS, Matlab) and large datasets (SQL). - Experience delivering projects that involve multiple cross-functional stakeholders across geographies. - Experience with fraud/abuse investigations, fraud/risk management, and security and threat analysis in the context of Internet-related products/activities. - Ability to work remotely and maintain excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base. This is a rare opportunity for a self-driven, start-up minded, strong and passionate developer to participate and contribute to a paradigm shift. We want People driven by the mission!   The successful candidate is expected to be an experienced developer in building critical low-latency/data-analytics driven solutions in investment banking/hedge funds/technology companies (low-latency trading systems or AdTech sector). This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including: •    You’ve built something exceptional you can showcase – demos/github/detailed explanation etc.. •    Strong knowledge of equities, bonds electronic markets and standard market making strategies •    Strong financial knowledge – to ease integration of quants libraries •    Strong problem solving skills •    Strong algorithm design and implementation background •    Strong knowledge in data structures •    Strong experience handling a vast amount of data •    Strong modelling background from raw data to a building for production fast predictive / explanation models •    Strong knowledge of statistics, data-analysis / machine learning / recommender engines concepts •    Proficient in a major language C# or Java and C++ for specific routines/algos •    Technical knowledge in a no-SQL / doc / columnar DB such as mongoDB, kdb, shell scripts in Linux/Unix and/or windows-based environments •    Experience in low latency, real-time, scalable systems, systematic trading, targeting / recommender systems, garbage collector, queuing, scheduling, complex events processing (CEP) •    Understanding of modern architecture/designs – micro-services/API-first development/high-throughput/event-driven/agent-based system, compositional frameworks •    Understanding of software development lifecycle •    Some knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines
job_req: Our Ideal Candidate Others desirable skills/knowledge: •    Ability to think “Product/platform” with a strong alignment with expected business outcomes/journeys •    Ability to scope minimum viable functionalities for quick and iterative/incremental deliveries – this is a must for the candidate •    Knowledge and some practical experience in modern dev-ops - CI/CD, containerization, orchestration Soft skills: •    Fluent in English (speaking and writing) •    Outstanding problem-solving skills •    Proactive, self-starter, autonomous Self-motivated, multi-tasking, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills, solution oriented with proven results •    Good team spirit •    Extreme curiousness •    This is a very demanding role which requires a start-up/entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to work fast, efficiently, under pressure on multiple deliveries How to Apply Please visit - https://scb.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=1900007596&lang=en  to apply now and take the next step in fulfilling your potential. To help speed up your application, please note the following:  You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information) We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application  It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience. Diversity & Inclusion Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. job_desc: The Solar Energy Research Institute of Singapore (SERIS) is Singapore’s national institute for applied solar energy research. SERIS conducts industry-oriented research and development as well as use-inspired basic research in the field of solar energy conversion. The institute collaborates closely with universities, research organisations, government agencies and industry, both locally and globally. The collaborations with companies from the global solar sector span from small startups to industry leading heavyweights. Job Scope: In view of recent developments, SERIS is currently looking for a high-calibre individual, with an outstanding drive towards innovation and applying deep-tech systems to the fields of energy meteorology and solar forecasting. He / She will conduct research activities and responsible for managing product and software development specifically in the area of sky cameras and sky imagers. Essential duties and responsibilities include the following (other duties may be assigned):  Further evolve the field of sky cameras and sky imagers for the application in operational solar forecasting Drive SERIS’ in-house developments on sky cameras and sky imagers and design & implement new features and functionalities, which entails hardware & software development, field-testing & certification. Investigate on machine learning based forecasting models from the sky camera’s atmospheric observations. Develop the sky camera based system for monitoring the cloud coverage and cloud dynamics. Analyze radiance distributions and create 3-D solar insolation profiles. Work on techniques to estimate global, direct and diffuse irradiance. Evaluate market potential and assess the possibility to create a spin-off company for the SERIS’ in-house developed sky camera.
job_req: PhD in Electrical Engineering with focus on power electronics and knowledge on embedded systems & micro-electronics. Know-how and experience in PV system technology, IoT (Internet of Things) applications, forecasting methodologies. Additional knowledge in meteorology and/or atmospheric physics is desirable Demonstrated significant scientific contributions in the form of top-tier journals papers and leading conference contributions. Candidates are expected to have hands-on experience in commercializing products from an ideation stage all the way until certification and market entry. Additional management degree is desirable. Proven excellent engineering and project management skills Demonstrated strong initiative and follow through in executing project initiatives, overcoming obstacles and balancing multiple priorities effectively with strong negotiation skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment with engineers, consultants, regulators and customers. Highly motivated, well organized and can work efficiently both in teams as well as independently. Possess a passion for sustainable energy. Minimum 4 - 5 years of experience

job_desc: Our team is seeking talented, motivated and dedicated individual for the role of Helpdesk Consultant for multiple projects. If you’re naturally a helper, enjoy assisting people with software or hardware issues whether the problem relates to a user error, a bug or something else entirely and are able to explain technical details simply. If this sounds like a good fit, we’d like to meet you.Mentioned below are the roles & responsibilities and desired skill set: The Company Bambu is a Fintech start-up which specialises in providing Robo-Advisory solutions for banks, insurance companies and non-financial industries like Telcos & E-Commerce. Leveraging on deep learning technologies, we believe that we can change the way people save, invest and manage their wealth. We are a fast-growing start-up based in Singapore and Hong Kong. Founded in 2016, we have raised funding from the likes of Franklin Templeton and Wavemaker, achieved a global network of prospects and established clients like Standard Chartered and Thomson Reuters. We launched Singapore’s first Robo-Advisory platform for Crossbridge Capital, a global wealth management firm and aiming to get new prospective clients on board. We have attained multiple accolades and won the Best Early Stage Startup at Fintech Finals 2017and the Best Show Award in FinovateAsia 2017 for our innovative machine learning People Like Me. We are also Alumni of SuperCharger 2.0 Accelerator program and top 24 finalists at Jumpstart organised by Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund. Roles & Responsibilities  Focused.Someone who’s keen in finding out solutions to every problem rather than presenting problem to every solution. Accountable.Takes full ownership and won’t be able to sleep at night until issues are resolved by thorough diagnostic of any hardware or software faults and take accountabilityof customer issues reported and seeing problems through to resolution. Detail oriented.Ensure all issues are properly logged, prioritize and manage several open issues at one time with agreed time limits.From the moment a ticket is submitted, this person knows how to ask the right questions and gather the available data to narrow down the root cause of the issue. Like Sherlock Holmes, they leave no stone unturned in figuring out what’s really going on. Quality over quantity.When you have a long list of tickets, and know there are more coming in, it’s tempting to work on as many as possible, without truly solving the problem at hand. Focusing on the quality of the support you give, as opposed to the quantity of tickets you touch, will ensure you’re actually solving problems and creating happy customers. Process driven.Following standard procedures for proper escalation of unresolved issues to the appropriate internal teams (e.g. software developers). This person understands support processes are important, and not only follows them, but helps improve them.  Consistent.Follow up with clients to ensure their systems are fully functional after troubleshooting. Excellent communication skills.Communicate with clients through a series of actions, either via phone, email or chat, until they’ve solved a technical issue. Team player.Optimistic and works well with colleagues with a collaborative team spirit. This person enjoys themselves at work, spreading a positive can-do attitude. A great support agent integrates a bit of fun into their daily tasks to make everyone’s loads a little lighter. Customer centric.Works with the customer and not for the customer, helps build strong customer relationship for long-term business. Tech Savvy.Sound knowledge in cloud environment, API integration and SQL. Must have the urge to learn and adopt to fast pace environment.
job_req: Must Have  To be qualified for this role, you should hold a degree in a relevant field, like Computer Science, Computer Engineering or any IT related course. Must have proven work experience of at least 3-5 years in a software support role, Technical Support Engineer, Desktop Support Engineer, IT Help Desk Technician or similar role that required technical troubleshooting. Good foundation with any programming/coding/scripting language with at least 2 years of experience in debugging in software design, testing, and/or troubleshooting or has been engaged as a software quality analyst, certified software tester, or similar designation.  Good to have  Finance or Banking domain background. Familiarity with any helpdesk software like BMC remedy, JIRA, ServiceNow, AWS or Zendesk.   A fundamental understanding of IT service management and the ITIL business process. Experience on being a devops focused on Java Script or Node.JS and/or have been deployed using AWS.

job_desc: The Genome Institute of Singapore (GIS) is an institute of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR). It has a global vision that seeks to use genomic sciences to improve public health and public prosperity. Established in 2001 as a centre for genomic discovery, the GIS will pursue the integration of technology, genetics and biology towards the goal of individualized medicine.     We are looking for motivated candidate who will be developing/maintaining relational databases and web portal hosting high-throughput screening data from across A*STAR, NUS, NUH and industry users. The individual will conduct analysis conforming to the ISO standard procedures established in the platform and develop customised analyses for academic as well as industry users. He/she will assist in the development of machine learning models for predicting drug response from various types of cellular models, image segmentation and analysis of cellular microscopy images as well as development of new platform technologies through research collaborations with academic and industry partners.
job_req: ·       Bachelor in Computational Biology/Computer Science/Computer Engineering ·       Knowledge/experience in analysing genomic/proteomic data ·       Biological knowledge and skilled in scripting language (e.g. Perl, Python, CGI) and UNIX system ·       Creative and good team player ·       Ability to communicate effectively with bench scientists/biologists   The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: The HP-NTU Digital Manufacturing Corporate Lab is a corporate research laboratory set up in partnership between NTU and tech giant HP. A series of research projects is being funded under this collaboration, mainly focusing in areas of advancing digital manufacturing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, new materials and applications, cyber security and customization. Our project currently seeks suitable team members to lead the research into various topics relating to Digital Manufacturing and subsequently develop a series of instructional programs, materials and resources focusing on Industry 4.0 revolution.
job_req: Bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering or Industrial Engineering with a strong interest in Computation Design Basic understanding of computational form strategy and process, with keen interest in mechanics, dynamics and aesthetics Comfortable working in virtual 3D spaces and willing to learn and pick up 3D modelling software, creative coding and programming Some experience working with 3D printers, designing for 3D printing and artwork fabrication will be advantageous Some knowledge in data analytics and machine learning is a plus Self-motivated and able to work independently or as a team player with strong interpersonal and collaborative skills Effective communication skills and a good command in English (verbal and written) is essential Fresh graduates with a Degree from a reputable University are welcome to apply     We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: The HP-NTU Digital Manufacturing Corporate Lab is a corporate research laboratory set up in partnership between NTU and tech giant HP. A series of research projects is being funded under this collaboration, mainly focusing in areas of advancing digital manufacturing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, new materials and applications, cyber security and customization. job_req: Ph.D. in the field of Mechanical Engineering or Industrial Engineering with a strong passion for research in the domain where Design, Art and Technology intersect Knowledge in digital manufacturing techniques and computer systems for 3D printing / Additive manufacturing Familiar with experience-driven design process in product development Good to have experience working with electronics, sensors and on physical computing integration Basic understanding of data analytics and machine learning for IoT, and cyber-physical systems will be advantageous Possess good leadership and project management capabilities Self-motivated and able to work independently or as a team player with strong interpersonal and collaborative skills Good communication skills and a strong command in English (verbal and written) is essential    We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_desc: In your new role you will:  Collect, analyse and interpret qualitative & quantitative data with statistical theories and methods Prove concepts, prototypes and implementations, mainly pertaining to the solutions and services in Business Analytics encompassing: 	 Machine learning; Diagnostic Analytics ; Predictive modelling; Social Media Analytics; Web Analytics     Data Processing & Preparation Create and review technical design documentations to ensure the accurate development of analytical models Build text analytical models using different types of sources (internal, social media, etc)  Build Performance Metrics & dashboard/storyboard to present information and insights gathered as part of analysis
job_req: You are best equipped for this task if you have:  Bachelor or Masters Degree in any IT-related discipline/Mathematics/Statistics or equivalent qualifications with min. 3 years of working experience in IT or supply chain. Hands-on working knowledge in the following areas: Data mining and modelling techniques, statistical analysis and econometric.  Working knowledge of the following analytical tools: Tableau, SPSS Modeler Working Knowledge in the area of Predictive Analytics  Working knowledge of ‘Text Analytics’ implementation process  Programming languages such as Python, R, SQL Intuitive & Curious data wizard mindset with high ‘figure-it-out’ quotient Logical & Enthusiast statistics genius  Highly motivated, structured and methodical with high degree of self-initiative Excellent interpersonal skills with enhanced facilitation skills and practice influencing techniques Team player with good cross-cultural skills to work in international team Customer and Result orientated
comp: INFINEON TECHNOLOGIES ASIA PACIFIC PTE LTD

job_desc: The Cyber Security Lab under the School of Computer Science and Engineering has one Research Associate opening in the areas of image processing, pattern recognition, computer vision, machine learning and deep learning.  The position involves designing and implementing computer vision and machine learning algorithms and evaluating their performance.
job_req: The candidate must have :  a Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, or related disciplines. Fluency in Python and Matlab is required. Knowledge in machine learning, including deep learning, image processing, pattern recognition and computer vision is a must. Independent research experience and experience in developing and deploying algorithms are essential. More than 2 years of relevant experience including research projects in university.

job_desc: About RedMart RedMart is Singapore's largest online grocery marketplace. We are a part of Alibaba-backed Lazada, Southeast Asia’s leading online shopping and selling platform. Our online marketplace offers over 100,000 grocery and household essentials items with the convenience of home delivery 7 days a week. Our mission is to save people time and money for the important things in life. We are a fast growing, tech-powered company with an awesome culture (see our culture deck). We have great tech teams in Singapore and Bangalore. We work on a wide range of areas: consumer-facing mobile and web applications, search, recommendations, e-commerce, marketing automation, CRM, marketplace seller platform, supply chain automation, warehouse fulfilment and automation, transportation logistics and last mile delivery. If you are interested in being part of the team that is transforming the grocery business, helping people save time and money daily, solving interesting challenges, and working with smart and passionate people, we want to hear from you. Role Purpose At RedMart we use technology to delight our customers; we innovate to make our customers’ lives better.   As Engineering Manager - Transport you will be responsible for leading a software team building transport intelligence systems at RedMart. This team is responsible for optimising delivery efficiency while maintaining a high rate of on-time delivery and offering a variety of delivery options to our customers. The team will be based in Singapore.    As an Engineering Manager you will: • Lead a team of software engineers and data scientists that has full ownership of key parts of RedMart’s Last Mile Delivery platforms, such as routing and location intelligence. • Conceptualize and implement transportation and telematics products, apps, algorithms and data analytics to provide a fast, reliable, convenient delivery experience at financially sustainable costs.  • Set the technical architecture for the team and take an active role in defining the product roadmap.  • Be responsible for driving impact by delivering on key initiatives as well as technical and business KPIs. You’ll be expected to make a significant impact on these through great technical judgment, business process understanding, close relationships with other technical leaders and your business counterparts, focused execution and frequent delivery. • Attract, develop and retain the best software engineers and data scientists. Help them innovate, make an impact, continually improve at their job and grow in their careers. • Champion engineering and operational excellence. Lead your team to design, implement, test and run in production robust, highly available automated routing solutions that our 24/7 store and operations can rely on.   • Lead and contribute to cross-functional initiatives to improve engineering at RedMart. • Collaborate with other engineering leaders, product managers, and business counterparts to deliver company-wide initiatives. • Foster a culture of continuous improvement through mentoring, feedback, and metrics.   What do we look for in a candidate? • Customer focus. Everything we do starts with our customers external and internal. • Impact. We are results oriented. We value people who focus on the right things and get them done. • Perseverance. Building a great company that customers love is hard work. Many challenges await and we are looking for team members we can count on when things get tough. • Ownership. We are looking for team members who are not only owners of their work but regard themselves as owners of the company as well. They are flexible in what they do and constantly seek out ways to have a greater impact on customers and our company.  • Breadth and depth of technology experience and strong technical and product judgment.  • Track record of building and leading great development teams through hiring and coaching.  • Track record of successfully delivering multi-stakeholder projects that marry technology, people, and processes.  • Machine Learning and Domain knowledge. Experience with building software for logistics, transportation or running Machine Learning and optimization systems in production is a must. • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
job_req: We develop on a modern technology stack that focuses on enabling engineers to be productive and impactful. Engineers work in teams to determine their own release schedules; teams develop, release and operate their software independently. We are strong believers in automation: we use automation for continuous integration, testing, and delivery. Although we use Amazon Web Services, we use open source software where possible. We continuously add to and update our technology stack. • Microservices written in Java or Scala using Play Framework or Akka, and occasionally Python and NodeJS. • AngularJs for web apps. • Native apps use Objective C/Swift (iOS) and Java/Kotlin (Android), Fastlane, Calabash, Cocoapods/Gradle, JUnit, and occasionally hybrid React Native. • MongoDB, Cassandra, Hazelcast for storage. • RabbitMQ for messaging. • AWS infrastructure, with HAProxy, Nginx, Redis. Chef deployments. • GitHub, Travis CI and Trello, Slack for development tools. • Testing with JUnit, ScalaTest, FrisbyJS, Calabash and Selenium. • Kinesys, Spark and AWS Redshift for our data infrastructure.

job_desc: At AI Singapore (AISG), we have a mission to anchor deep national capabilities in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and create social and economic impact, accelerate the adoption of AI by Singapore-based organisations, nurture the local talent and put Singapore onto the world map.   As an AI Infrastructure Engineer under the AI Innovation Industry team, you'll help to build and operate modern infrastructures and systems to run machine learning and deep learning workloads at scale. You are a person who strives to improve their knowledge of infrastructure, systems and automation continually.   Entry-level graduates are welcome to apply for a Junior position for this role provided that they show some experience contributing in an infrastructure-related Open Source project for at least a year or similar.   Those with technical leadership experience are welcome to apply for a Senior position for this role.   In this role, you will:  Build and maintain production infrastructure to be resilient, secure and high performance. Build and maintain infrastructure as code to automate the configuration, provisioning, deployment and monitoring of our systems. Collaborate with AISG partners to design, implement, and deploy new systems and improvements to existing systems. Work on infrastructure systems procurement and commissioning. Document and investigate issues arising from our systems when they occur. Develop tools and software that improves and automates infrastructure. Propose and drive technical decisions to completion. Mentor AISG Apprentices and others from a software engineering or infrastructure capacity.
job_req: To succeed in this role, we are looking for you to have a majority of the following knowledge and skills:  Excellent communication skills including thoughtful listening skills and the ability to express complex ideas clearly and succinctly. The ability to reason about engineering issues holistically using engineering fundamentals and knowledge about architecture. A systematic approach to development and engineering, such as debugging or object-oriented design, DevOps practices, and agile software development. Have held at least one software engineering or infrastructure position for a minimum of 3 years. Familiarity with data centre environments and appreciation of data centre operations. Proficient in at least one commonly used programming language, such as Python, Ruby, Go, Rust, Javascript, Java, C#, etc. Proficient in administering Linux systems. Proficiency in at least one automation tool, such as Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Bash, PowerShell, etc. Familiarity with virtualisation technologies such as KVM, VMWare etc . Familiarity with container and container orchestration technologies such as Docker, rkt, Singularity, Kubernetes, Docker Swarm etc. Familiarity with Clouds such as AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform and code deployment tools. Familiarity with distributed systems and related technologies and tools such as high-performance computing cluster systems, Hadoop systems, job/workload schedulers etc. An aptitude for automated system design and implementation (automated deployments and automated testing).

job_desc: About Janio Janio is a cross-border logistics platform that provides an integrated end-to-end logistics solution to merchants across Southeast Asia (SEA). At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform. Head of Digital Marketing Working at the intersection of technology and business, our goal is to bring the world’s most innovative people to Janio and provide the tools to help them thrive. As Head of Digital Marketing, you will build and lead a team of seasoned integrated marketing individuals responsible for programs that deliver against influenced pipeline goals. The successful candidate will have a track record reflecting significant experience building this practice from the ground up, and demonstrate the ability to operate and excel at the strategic as well as tactical levels. He/She will be responsible for: Digital and Social Media Marketing  Building the company's online presence Developing the company website as a tool for growth through creating of site pages, content and copy Developing strategies and executing digital campaigns to drive traffic, engagement and lead generation across all relevant digital and social channels through: 	 Developing and optimizing web pages, content and copy for search engine optimisation and conversion Content activation across non-paid channels for effective reach and conversion   Planning, executing and optimizing paid marketing campaigns across platforms Developing relationships with current and potential partner channels for co-marketing efforts Planning and executing of co-marketing efforts with partner organizations, including co-creation of content and content syndication Monitoring and reporting performance across digital channels and providing recommendations for improvement Coordinating all digital marketing efforts with the marketing and creative teams and with cross-functional stakeholders Working closely with the sales team in contributing to revenue growth targets and attributing results to marketing efforts Building, managing and leading a team of digital growth marketers from the ground up Development of internal marketing structures and SOPs for efficient marketing operations Managing of digital marketing budget  PR and Partner Marketing  Planning and executing joint digital marketing activities such as co-publishing of content, co-promotion of relevant marketing initiatives Developing, implementing and managing public relations strategies to create a strong, favourable image of the company Drafting and pitching marketing-related ideas and proposals to media, government and industry partners Managing and building strong external stakeholder relations
job_req: Equivalent or proven experience in a dynamic, hyper-growth environment (e.g. talent management, consulting, high-growth technology environment) Previous experience working in the APAC region is preferred Previous experience in a technology-based company or in growing businesses in emerging markets Demonstrated history of driving growth Demonstrated leadership and team building abilities Hands on experience in any combination of the following: Content marketing, SEO, Paid digital,product marketing, partnership marketing, conversion rate optimization, digital marketing strategy Prior experience in growth marketing, partnership marketing or PR is advantageous Prior experience in regional markets is advantageous

job_desc: About Janio Janio is a cross-border logistics platform that provides an integrated end-to-end logistics solution to merchants across Southeast Asia (SEA). At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform. Regional Business Development Manager Janio Asia is looking for a Regional Business Development Manager to join our team. Regional Managers are exposed to multiple aspects of setting up a business in a fast-paced startup environment. We invite candidates with an entrepreneurial and motivated mindset, as well as a keen interest in combining logistics with new technologies, to apply. The successful candidate will:   be treated as co-business owner who positively contributes not only to business development/sales but all aspects of the business   be tasked with ensuring a consistent, high-level of service across all countries we operate in   liaise with colleagues and partners across multiple geographies to troubleshoot and resolve any and all issues related to business development and sales   This position reports directly to the Chief Operating Office (COO). We offer candidates opportunities to develop and grow professionally as valued team members in a dynamic and often cross-functional startup environment.
job_req: Develop the pipeline of new business Identifies, validates and assigns new leads to local sales managers Executes strategy to support region and company strategies/goals by identifying potential sales opportunities Works cross functionally with internal resources; customer service, product management, marketing, design engineering and service, etc. to bring viable solutions for customer’s needs to win the business. Assists Customer Service and Field Sales Team in the resolution of customer disputes Locates potential business by targeted segment. Develop strategic customer sales / marketing plans and participates in business planning. Represents the Company and the brands at trade shows, and similar events to create business opportunities. Maintain and develop CRM database, provide monthly reports and forecasts. Tracks and documents prospecting activities, new contact names, and opportunity qualification notes. Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations. Bachelor’s degree or 1-3 years work experience in any field - a background in Logistics, Business, Management, or Entrepreneurship an advantage Can work independently Can speak and write English fluently

job_desc: Under the Air Traffic Management Research Institute (ATMRI) (http://atmri.ntu.edu.sg/), Nanyang Technological University, you will be part of a research team to study the use of Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics in Air Traffic Management Systems. Specifically, you will  Undertake research and development related to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning applied to Air Traffic Management. Develop algorithms and models, perform data mining, doing analytics, and building high quality strategic planning system for future for Air Traffic Management (ATM) systems. You will provide expertise on algorithmic concepts for the broader applied analytics of ATM and inspire the adoption of advanced analytics and data science across the entire breadth of ATM system.
job_req: 1.    Education Qualifications:  PhD Degree in Computer Sc. /Aerospace Eng/Operation Research  2.    Research Experience:  Demonstrated experience in Air Traffic Algorithm/Software design and development.           3.    Research Publication  Good Publication record in peer-reviewed conferences and/or Journals related to Machine Learning/Air Traffic Management.  4.    Programming Experience:  Demonstrated expertise in MATLAB, C++, Python Programming Languages Understanding of Machine Learning techniques/Deep Learning algorithms is desirable.  5.    Good English writing and communication skills (required) 6.    Independent and team player (required)

job_desc: We are looking for a senior research assistant to create and maintain an experimental framework to develop novel statistical techniques that will aid in improving large-scale regression, classification and other machine learning problems. The ideal candidate would be comfortable programming in C++ and Matlab, have strong analytical skills, and have ability to learn new things. There is also opportunity for the senior research assistant to contribute ideas to the research and participate directly in the research.
job_req: A Bachelor or Master’s degree in Mathematics / Applied Mathematics / Statistics / Computer Science or equivalent with a strong background in university mathematics and statistics is required.

job_desc: Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects. The School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore invites applications for several postdoc research fellow positions in the following areas:  Robot vision Machine Learning Mobile robotics
job_req: Applicants for the postdoc research fellow position should hold a Ph.D degree in relevant areas; have a track record of research experience in terms of publications; have a good command of English and are able to communicate well. Application Procedure: Interested candidates please send your CV/resume to: Prof CHEAH Chien Chern School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering Nanyang Technological University 50 Nanyang Avenue Block S2.1 Singapore 639798   E-mail Address for E-mailed Applications: ECCCheah@ntu.edu.sg  Electronic submission of application is highly encouraged. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified for interview.

job_desc: The Technology Group (TG) is a key enabler to keep our business moving forward and is constantly exploiting state-of-the-art information technologies to enhance GIC’s ability to be the leading global long-term investment firm. We aim to provide users with empowering and transformational capabilities, and to create an inclusive, innovative and integrated work environment. This role is embedded in an integrated team that provides investment services for all public market investment activities. Exposure opportunities  You will play a key project lead / manager role in investment services public market domains to:                   - build and support systems across entire trade lifecycle to achieve world-class operational excellence and execution;                   - help the firm manage and interface with external fund managers who bring extended investment expertise and intelligence to table    As a person with strong analytical reasoning and conceptual thinking skills, you will use your technology know-how to bring value to the business. You will participate in high-value complex projects based on Agile principles and work with an expanded toolset beyond the traditional programming languages, including Python, Tableau, Informatica, Jenkins and messaging technologies, while keeping an eye out for emerging technology trends and developments.   As an excellent team player with a collaborative mind-set, you will work hand-in-hand with various facets of the business across Front, Middle, and Back Office, the extended Technology team in GIC as well as industry peers and partners.   You will have access to structured and unstructured data and use data science techniques including predictive modelling and machine learning to identify areas to enhance business capabilities (for External Managers domain).   You will also work alongside experienced professionals and continue to learn.
job_req: Requirements  Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or equivalent. Programming experience in object-oriented languages. Working proficiency in SQL and Stored Procedures (MSSQL or Oracle). Relevant experience in data science preferred (for External Managers domain). Strong collaboration skills, able to partner and work effectively across teams and with business stakeholders. Good communication skills, able to articulate technology concepts, drive discussions on requirements with stakeholders.  If you are interested in the role, please apply directly to the following link: https://career10.successfactors.com/sfcareer/jobreqcareer?jobId=5811&company=gicprivate&username=

job_desc: You will develop and apply machine learning techniques to underwater acoustic signal processing and underwater robotics problems in various marine science and engineering projects.
job_req: *PhD in machine learning, underwater acoustic signal processing, or equivalent *A strong interest in academic and applied research *Expertise in machine learning *Experience in applying machine learning to signal processing tasks *Domain knowledge or experience in underwater acoustics will be an advantage *Self-motivated

job_desc: HOOQ Content Team is seeking Senior Manager, Data Analytics Content. You will be responsible for providing insights into business performance and key drivers of the business. You will be an expert at extracting and analyzing data, have the ability to translate data into insights, can tackle multiple projects at the same time, likes to problem-solve and loves films and series. You will be instrumental in leading the use of analytics as a critical value driver and source of competitive advantage across our organization. If you are someone who thrives in a team environment and gains personal satisfaction when sharing knowledge and partnering with teams, then this is a great role for you.  The Responsibilities  Apply advanced analytics techniques (core statistical-modeling, data visualization, data mining, machine learning) to extract actionable insights through analysis of large-scale, high-dimensional data How can we optimize the content library for retention and maximal subscriber engagement? Is our content library serving every individual across our diverse subscriber base? How do we measure this? How do we ensure that our content recommendations are maximally relevant? How should we allocate our content budget for maximal subscriber growth? Is our user interface working well for every individual across our diversesubscriber base? How do we measure this? … and more. Analyze data to identify trends, support critical business decisions, highlight problem areas and elevate key insights to management Build and maintain periodic and adhoc reports for team members, giving transparency on content and user-behavior metrics over weekly/monthly/quarterly time frames Create custom dashboards in Tableau for efficient communication of key performance indicators tailored to team needs and objectives Compile thoughtful post-mortem analyses to derive insights into the performance of specific content deals or programming categories  A successful candidate will be self-motivated, proactive, quick-thinking, flexible, able to pivot when necessary, thorough and able to juggle multiple and diverse responsibilities with astrong emphasis on organization and an unwavering attention to detail at all times.
job_req: Experience - 5+ years of experience performing big data analysis, preferably in OTT, film and/or television Start-up experience strongly preferred Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research, Computer Science or equivalent Demonstrated experience in driving business decisions with data-driven analyses Ability to think analytically, problem solve, and turn information into compelling stories and Executive-level presentations Required technical skills: SQL, Excel, PowerPoint and Tableau Outstanding verbal, written, and visual communication skills

job_desc: Business Function Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. Responsibilities   To be part of Central COO team and be able to articulate and market the vision for Tech Strategic programs across T&O. Able to contribute and participate in the Platform Transformation programs and concepts to enable technology platform transformation across group.   Practitioner of business agile and 4D methodology, able to define Epics, Workstreams based on the organizational Hoshin. End-to-end management of transformation projects from the preparation of Benefits Map, initialization phase (business case) to the execution phase (setup, status update, tracking and implementation). Deploy machine learning solution into production environment and integrate into operation  Identify and solve issues when putting model into production – load balancing, distribution, through-put, latency, availability, stability, refactoring, repackaging, versioning, scoring, real time / online scoring, performance monitoring and management,  Provide insights based on data analysis to derive on the strategic decisions. Provide leadership to the program to equip them with the necessary skills to perform their roles through consultative management.  Driving a team of skilled SME across the internal technology units (eg. Application Teams, Infrastructure Team, Deployment Team), corporate support functions and external vendors to ensure that issues and opportunities are managed and tracked holistically.
job_req: Masters or Degree in Computer Science or Engineering with 13 –16 years of relevant work experience with proven record of strong program and project management proficiency  Must have proven experience in driving Strategic initiatives and Process improvement programs Familiar with development, deployment, production and operation life cycle of the machine learning product and software best practices such as SDLC, CICD, Test-Driven Development (TDD) Proficiency in Python, R, Spark, Java, Scala and JIRA Banking technology experience with PMP, PRINCE2, Agile Certification preferred Expertise in Data Analytics skills, ability to derive insights from data and good to have knowledge on Platform transformation concepts Expertise in the open source stack of bid data and machine learning solutions such as Hadoop, Spark, YARN, Mesos, Hive, Impala, Spark Streaming, Kafka, API, Anaconda / R studio server, Kubernetes,  Demonstrated ability to work independently and manage initiatives in a fast-paced environment. Proven leadership and people management skills required, along with excellent written, communication and presentation skills. Focused on outcomes (moving the business forward) and adept at managing diverse relationships across geography and culture.
address: MARINA BAY FINANCIAL CENTRE, 12 MARINA BOULEVARD 018982

Show passion in designing, and developing a distributed application, good exposure in Microservice. Strong capability to solve problems, be an out-of-box thinker who frequently comes up with new and ideas.

Minimum 3 years of working experience in Solaris/Linux. Strong capability to solve problems, be an out-of-box thinker who frequently comes up with new and ideas.

Show passion in designing, and developing a distributed application, good exposure in Microservice. job_desc: You provide decision support by leading, planning and executing data analytics studies. This includes developing machine learning models and data products, and directing data analytics studies to evaluate options and highlight insights. You also collaborate with business units to translate business problems into tractable analytics projects and implement them. Additionally, you groom the junior members of the analytics team and the larger community of practice in MINDEF/SAF. Your challenge lies in communicating effectively with users to understand their business while conveying to them complex and technical information, as well as keeping abreast of the latest knowledge and skills on data analytics. You must have a tertiary qualification with strong mathematics and computing foundation, with 5 years’ relevant work experience in data analytics. Proficiency in Python, R or other analytics tools will be considered favourably. To apply, please visit our website at http://www.mindef.gov.sg/dxo/careers-details.html#/tab2. Only applications submitted through our website will be processed. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

The Application Infrastructures (AI) team of the Government Digital Services (GDS) Team aims to spearhead the digital transformation of government. Our objective is to catapult our government infrastructure into the new digital era with faster time to market, operational agility, automated deployment and scalability. AI is an open source, agile development and operation house that is bold, agile and collaborative. The team is responsible for designing, prototyping, building and operating different products and services. Today, AI has 3 flagship products and several upcoming initiatives. As a Delivery Manager, you will be responsible for identifying and mitigating potential delivery impacts to ensure successful project delivery through close collaboration with cross-functional teams. We are looking for an individual with strong interpersonal skills who likes working in a delivery focused, agile environment with multidisciplinary teams. What to Expect:   Manage Product Delivery: Ensure products are delivered according to customer priorities and timelines, coaching and enabling the team where needed.   Building Up Teams: Institute engineering best practices and methodologies such as Agile. Facilitate open team communications and foster a culture of continual improvement.   Delivery Support: Support the team through project management activities such as tracking finances, hiring and recruitment, managing relationships with vendors and management. Triage run-time issues, and actively clear development impediments.   Business Modelling: Develop business plans, including product pricing, negotiations with vendors and channel strategy. Effectively communicate recommendations to management and create buy-in with customers.   How to Succeed:   Bachelor’s degree in any quantitative discipline or equivalent practical experience.   Experience with modern software engineering methodologies such as Agile.   Experience with coaching teams towards self-leadership and open communication.   Diplomacy, leadership and facilitation are necessary skills.   Be oriented towards transparency, trust, encouraging autonomy, mastery and purpose.   Prepare to challenge and change the status quo if it does not enable the team.   Knowledge of modern software technology stacks and machine learning will be favored

job_desc:
Senior/Principal Researcher, Underground Geospatial
Job Scope:

Research and experiment emerging geospatial technologies (such as automated change detection, spatial-temporal analysis, machine learning algorithms), in collaboration with other agencies or technology/research institutions.
Conceptualise and formulate high-level strategies, design system architectures and develop technical standards required for the integration and use of (2D and 3D) above-ground and underground geospatial information.
Build, code, and test geospatial technologies and algorithms (including data acquisition, data integration, modelling visualisation, and analytics).

Requirements:

Degree or Masters preferably in the areas of GeoSpatial Science/Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent.
At least 3 years of working experience in geospatial information science and technology or related fields.
Proficient knowledge in GIS, geospatial data modelling, and geodatabase management, and open standards
Knowledge in machine learning and change detection techniques, remote sensing, application development will be an added advantage.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work in a team.

job_desc: We are seeking a high energy and passionate Virtual Assistant (Chatbot) product evangelist with good technical knowledge to join our team that develop meaningful digital services.   Our products’ motto is to serve our citizens’ need through intuitive user centric design and anticipates their evolving needs with data analytics as they transit through crucial moments of their life.  Be part of the team that builds the next generation multi-channel virtual assistant that can intelligently engages citizens in conversational manner as it helps to identify and complete their transactions with the Government.   You will be collaborating with diverse group of multi-disciplinary colleagues, forward looking government agency stakeholders and competent solution partners, all bonded by the same burning desire to make a better future through our products.   You shall exhibit an outcome oriented personality and is experienced with the realization process from system design to solution evaluation to technical implementation.  The ability to pick up new skills and constantly looking for relevant emerging solutions are equally important in our work!  Of course, we can never escape from operational work that comes with the need to keep our digital services running 24/7.   Success in this role will be demonstrated by your ability to translate our products’ vision into reality.   You will play an integral part in a team to design and then realize the Government’s next phase plans to engage Citizens using conversation.   What to Expect:    Analyze business requirements, design and implement pilots and proof of concepts   Develop, integrate and maintain in-house or external artificial intelligent and cognitive solution stacks   Create models, train and leveraging machine learning APIs to build solutions with embedded intelligence in a variety of domain-specific chatbot use-cases   Design master question and answer pairs and develop conversational flow   Write automated unit, feature and regression test suites   Support operation and handle queries for our suite of operationalized products      How to Succeed:    Disciplines in Information build domain centric intent-entity relationship or information graphs   Optimize master question-and-answer pairs and improve user experience through content design   Hands-on experience in developing webhook applications using Node.js or other server-side code implementation   Broad conceptual understanding of Machine Learning (Supervised & Unsupervised), Machine Classifiers and etc.   General
